title: Stopwatch Timer Application
description: A simple and interactive stopwatch application to measure time intervals, with start, stop, and reset functionalities.

title: Vowel Counter Application
description: An application that counts the number of vowels in a given text input, providing a quick analysis of vowel frequency.

title: Calculator Application
description: A basic calculator application that performs arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

title: Encryption Application
description: An application that encrypts and decrypts text using a simple algorithm, enhancing the security of messages.

title: Poll System Application
description: A polling system application that allows users to create polls and vote on various options, displaying the results dynamically.

title: Password Generator Application
description: A secure password generator that creates random passwords based on user-defined criteria like length and character types.

title: Cash Calculator Application
description: An application to help users calculate the total amount of cash by entering different denominations and their quantities.

title: HEX Code Generator
description: A tool that generates random HEX color codes, useful for web developers and designers looking for color inspiration.

title: TO-DO List
description: A TO-DO list application that allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as completed, helping them manage their daily tasks effectively.

title: Drag And Drop Image Uploader
description: An application that allows users to upload images by dragging and dropping them into a designated area, simplifying the upload process.
